thread.title: John Hurt Dead - Oscar-Nominated Actor Dies at 77
thread.title_full: John Hurt Dead - Oscar-Nominated Actor Dies at 77

author: Just Jared
title: John Hurt Dead - Oscar-Nominated Actor Dies at 77
text:
John Hurt has reportedly passed away at the age of 77, according to The Hollywood Reporter . 
The Oscar-nominated British actor announced that he was battling pancreatic cancer back in June of 2015.
John is best known for his roles in The Elephant Man and Midnight Express , which both landed him Oscar nominations. 
He is also known for his role as Ollivander in the Harry Potter films, Alien , appearances on Doctor Who and was most recently featured in Jackie alongside Natalie Portman . 
Our thoughts are with John â€˜s friends and family during this difficult time.
